org.trianacode.taskgraph.service

Class HistoryTrackerAutoSave

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.service.HistoryTrackerAutoSave
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionListener

    public class HistoryTrackerAutoSave
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExecutionListener
    A TaskGraphManagerListener instance that attaches execution listeners to created tasks. If auto-save history tracking is enabled these listeners automatically write out the history.
